description: Numbers that are the sum of 4 nonzero squares in exactly 1 way.
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Square Number.
Index entries for sequences related to sums of squares
mathematica: selQ[n_] := Length[ Select[ PowersRepresentations[n, 4, 2], Times @@ # != 0 &]] == 1; Reap[Do[If[selQ[n], Print[n]; Sow[n]], {n, 1, 2000}]][[2, 1]] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Oct 03 2013 *)
author: _David W. Wilson_
